author: Ryo Arai

achievement_text.title: Image Registration for Medical Image
achievement_text.description: A research project that uses models such as VoxelMorph to perform superimposition on two images of the same subject taken in different fields of view and time frames.

achievement_text.title: Estimation of camera parameters using 3D skeletal model
achievement_text.description: Research project to estimate the location of camera parameters from human skeletal information obtained by estimation using OpenPose and VoxelPose.

achievement_text.title: Performance evaluation of generic language models
achievement_text.description: Research projects aimed at improving the all-coupling layer, improving the Embedding layer, and evaluating and improving the performance of continuous learning using the Bert model.

achievement_text.title: Operation and maintenance of in-house wiki
achievement_text.description: Operation and maintenance of the internal wiki created in August 2021.

achievement_text.title: Distribution of Windows Security Patch
achievement_text.description: Distribute Windows security patches to PCs in the same domain.

achievement_text.title: Testing of bandwidth control applications
achievement_text.description: Create a test for the Python code that performs network bandwidth control.

achievement_text.title: Development of an internal wiki
achievement_text.description: Create a technology sharing website for internal use.

achievement_text.title: Web site development for internal use
achievement_text.description: Create a website to share information for internal use.

portfolios_text.title: DeepLearning Demo
portfolios_text.description: This is a sample of DeepLearning model for learning etc.

about_instance: I usually drop instances, so please contact me if you wish to view them.
